text: Pangender or omnigender people identify as many or infinite genders. It is a non-binary, multigender, and transgender identity. It is also sometimes said to be under the polygender umbrella term. Sometimes the number of genders that pangender people identify as is unknown or may change. == Etymology == The word pangender comes from the Greek prefix pan-, meaning "all" or "every", and gender. Together this can mean "every gender", "all genders", or other similar translations. == References == Category:Non-binary gender
title: Pangender
